body: This is the only good miniguy doujin out there.
@richotty the end result is the same though. just keep it all under the same banner so I can catch it all with one black list tag.
Not true. Giantess means a female who is giant relative to relativity. A miniguy is a male who is tiny relative to relativity. You can have one without the other hence their separate functionalities.
mini guy and giantess should just be the same tag. they are functionally identical.
